title: The Antidisciplinary Approach to the Modern World
summary: Introduces antidisciplinary thinking as a foundation for working across and beyond traditional disciplines.
charter_alignment: Section II.1 Antidisciplinarity — explicitly introduces antidisciplinary thinking

title: Principles of Awareness
summary: Integrates contemplative traditions — attention, embodied cognition, and direct experience — as legitimate educational methods.
charter_alignment: Section II.8 Awareness Practices — attention, embodied cognition, and direct experience

title: Practical Antidisciplinary Problem Solving I
summary: Project-based course requiring students to develop AI workflows, manage sustained AI-assisted projects, and build metacognitive awareness.
charter_alignment: Section IV.1 Project-Centered Learning — bounded projects with real deliverables
Section IV.3 Computational and Agentic Systems — AI workflow development
Section II.6 Experimentation and Risk — real stakes, failure as learning

title: Practical Antidisciplinary Problem Solving II
summary: Continuation of APS I with deeper project complexity, sustained AI collaboration, and emphasis on metacognitive awareness.
charter_alignment: Section IV.1 Project-Centered Learning — bounded projects with real deliverables
Section IV.3 Computational and Agentic Systems — AI workflow development
Section II.6 Experimentation and Risk — real stakes, failure as learning

title: Advanced Research in Master's Program
summary: Extended AI-assisted research with emphasis on maintaining human judgment, context management, and security awareness.
charter_alignment: Section II.5 Intellectual Integrity — calibrated claims, honest engagement
Section IV.3 Computational and Agentic Systems — extended AI collaboration

title: Intelligent Agents
summary: Dedicated depth in symbiotic human-AI work, agent architectures, and the design of intelligent systems.
charter_alignment: Section II.3 Human and Artificial Intelligence — symbiotic human-AI work

title: Law and Governance
summary: Ethical and legal frameworks for technology, governance structures, and regulatory landscapes.
charter_alignment: Section II.5 Intellectual Integrity — ethical reflection alongside technical capability

title: Technology and Values
summary: Examines how values shape technological development and how technology reshapes human values.
charter_alignment: Section II.5 Intellectual Integrity — ethical reflection alongside technical capability

title: Digital Media & Flourishing
summary: Addresses human flourishing as an aim of technology, exploring how digital media can support or undermine wellbeing.
charter_alignment: Section II.2 Radical Transformation and Human Flourishing — flourishing as an aim of technology

title: Modern Physics
summary: Develops capacity to work with irreducible complexity and resist premature reduction through physics foundations.
charter_alignment: Section II.4 Complexity and Magic — working with irreducible complexity

title: Complex System Science
summary: Studies emergent behavior, self-organization, and nonlinear dynamics in complex adaptive systems.
charter_alignment: Section II.4 Complexity and Magic — working with irreducible complexity

title: Design & Prototyping
summary: Embodies the vocational orientation and bias toward action — students produce artifacts that exist in the world.
charter_alignment: Section IV.2 Learning Through Making — vocational orientation, bias toward action

title: Human and Machine Learning
summary: Explores the parallels and intersections between human cognition and machine learning systems.
charter_alignment: Section II.3 Human and Artificial Intelligence — symbiotic human-AI work

title: Modular Practice Seminar
summary: Lightweight, adaptable format for emerging topics — provides a mechanism for rapid curricular experimentation.
charter_alignment: Section IV.3 Computational and Agentic Systems — curriculum agility, iterating with AI advances

title: Engineering Ethics
summary: Ensures ethical reflection accompanies technical capability across doctoral research.
charter_alignment: Section II.5 Intellectual Integrity — ethical reflection alongside technical capability

title: Communication Practices
summary: Develops academic and professional communication skills for doctoral researchers.

title: Career Development Exercises
summary: Guided exploration of career pathways for doctoral researchers in antidisciplinary fields.

title: Advanced Research in Doctoral Program I
summary: First phase of extended doctoral research with AI collaboration, emphasizing human judgment and context management.
charter_alignment: Section II.5 Intellectual Integrity — calibrated claims, honest engagement
Section IV.3 Computational and Agentic Systems — extended AI collaboration

title: Advanced Research in Doctoral Program II
summary: Second phase of doctoral research, deepening investigation and advancing toward dissertation milestones.

title: Advanced Research in Doctoral Program III
summary: Final phase of doctoral research, completing the dissertation and preparing for defense.

title: Advanced Intelligent Agents
summary: PhD-level depth in agent architectures, multi-agent systems, and advanced human-AI collaboration.
charter_alignment: Section II.3 Human and Artificial Intelligence — symbiotic human-AI work

title: Advanced Human and Machine Learning
summary: PhD-level investigation of human cognition and machine learning convergence.
charter_alignment: Section II.3 Human and Artificial Intelligence — symbiotic human-AI work

title: Advanced Law and Governance
summary: PhD-level examination of legal and governance frameworks in emerging technology contexts.

title: Advanced Complex System Science
summary: PhD-level study of complex adaptive systems, emergence, and computational modeling.
charter_alignment: Section II.4 Complexity and Magic — working with irreducible complexity

title: Advanced Design and Prototyping
summary: PhD-level design research and advanced prototyping methods.
charter_alignment: Section IV.2 Learning Through Making — vocational orientation, bias toward action
